name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Gregory GAINER, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Gregory GAINER, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
The Judgment of Sentence of the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Burton A. Rose, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., James Jordan, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
425 A.2d 741
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Gregory GAINER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 27, 1981.
Decided Feb. 27, 1981.
Reargument Denied April 6, 1981.
Burton A. Rose, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., James Jordan, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
